comments.comment: It's quite hard to get mlpack to build in conda, but it's being worked on in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/conda-forge/mlpack-feedstock/pull/18>conda-forge/mlpack-feedstock#18</denchmark-link> .

I faced similiar problem when installing via conda. You can do this instead:
Install vcpkg((https://github.com/Microsoft/vcpkg) In cmd, go to vcpkg directory and write this: .\vcpkg install mlpack[tools]:x64-windows (If you wanna install library and its console programs) .\vcpkg install mlpack:x64-windows (If you wanna install just the library)

to install the package of Mlpack you can run one of the following: conda install -c conda-forge mlpack conda install -c conda-forge/label/gcc7 mlpack conda install -c conda-forge/label/cf201901 mlpack
